cause.description:
Children and families are fighting for survival in an area facing severe drought and the deadly threat of famine.
1. Millions in Africa are at risk of starvation. Children are at risk if the next rains fail and food does not reach them in time
cause.mission: responding with desperately needed food and care, but we need your help. Your gift will provide food to hungry people in some of the world's most devastated regions
cause.name: Food for hungry children and families in Africa
